page.title: 02FISHFARM,ABERMORDDU&DISTRICT
page.content: Alyn Fish Farm,started by Tom & Janet Morgan in 1978,is situated on the A541 at Cefnybedd. Mr.Morgan and an assistant work full time at the farm which now has its own hatchery fed by warm water from an energy saving, natural, gravity fed borehole.Water from the River Alyn supplies the fish tanks,which now contain between seventy and eighty thousand pellet fed {female}trout of varying sizes,which are kept for between eight and twelve months before being sold,either as table fish or smoked trout,mainly to local people or to hotels and restaurants in the Wrexham and Chester region. Despite problems such as river{ pollution,fish disease and long working hours,Mr.Morgan will increase capacity to allow for bulk {trade}to Manchester and London.
